## Classes

### jenkins_dood

Initializes jenkins_dood module

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include jenkins_dood
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `jenkins_dood` class.

##### `jenkins_version`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $jenkins_dood::params::jenkins_version

##### `listen_port_http`

Data type: `Integer`



Default value: $jenkins_dood::params::listen_port_http

##### `jenkins_opts`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: $jenkins_dood::params::jenkins_opts

##### `jenkins_plugins`

Data type: `Optional[Array]`



Default value: $jenkins_dood::params::jenkins_plugins

### jenkins_dood::config

Configures Jenkins using the parameters that were provided

### jenkins_dood::install

This installs docker and resources necessary prior to configuration and service startup

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include jenkins_dood::install
```

### jenkins_dood::params

Parameters accepted by this puppet module

### jenkins_dood::service

Manages the jenkins_dood docker container startup
